resources.string: Interstitial ads are full-screen ads that cover the interface of host app. They\'re typically displayed at natural transition points in the flow of an app, such as between activities or during the pause between levels in a game. When an app shows an interstitial ad, the user has the choice to either tap on the ad and continue to its destination or close it and return to the app.

Welcome to the PubMatic\'s SDK Sample app.
" + " This application helps you to test PubMatic\'s ad tag.
" + "
How to use:
" + " 1. Please select the desired ad type
" + " 2. Input your ad tag details like PubID (Publisher ID), SiteID (Publisher\'s site ID), AdID (Ad slot ID). Please get these details while creating an ad tag from PubMatic UI or please contact PubMatic sales team to get new ad tags for your app.
" + " 3. Optionally you can configure other targeting parameters for better monetisation.
" + " 4. App also provides Settings screen which allows to apply global settings for all platform and ad type.
" + "
Contact:
" + " To monetize your app using PubMatic platform, Please contact us
